<h2 id="data-sources">Data Sources</h2>
<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="getLedger" data-link-title="getLedger">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/blob/{{< param git_sha >}}/sdk/nodejs/qldb/getLedger.ts#L23">
        Data Source <strong>getLedger</strong>
    </a>
</h3>


<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>getLedger(args: <a href='#GetLedgerArgs'>GetLedgerArgs</a>, opts?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#InvokeOptions'>pulumi.InvokeOptions</a>): <a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise'>Promise</a>&lt;<a href='#GetLedgerResult'>GetLedgerResult</a>&gt; &amp; <a href='#GetLedgerResult'>GetLedgerResult</a></code></pre>


Use this data source to fetch information about a Quantum Ledger Database.

#### Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = aws.qldb.getLedger({
    name: "anExampleLedger",
});
```
